name: California State Parks Adventure Pass
description: California State Parks offers free access to fourth graders and their families as part of the Every Kid Outdoors initiative, encouraging young people to explore the state's natural and cultural heritage.
fullDescription: California State Parks offers free access to fourth graders and their families as part of the Every Kid Outdoors initiative, encouraging young people to explore the state's natural and cultural heritage.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free day-use passes to 54 participating state parks
- Valid for fourth graders at California public schools
- Covers the student and their family members
howToGetIt: Apply online through Reserve California. Fourth graders at public schools can register with their school information to receive passes.
